languages.text: "Значит, мы оба отмечены. Пока не одолеем его, телам нашим быть терзаемыми его смертоносным касанием. Но не страшись, эттфатер, мы повергнем духа. Клянусь".
"Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."
languages.original_text: "Значит, мы оба отмечены. Пока не одолеем его, телам нашим быть терзаемыми его смертоносным касанием. Но не страшись, эттфатер, мы повергнем духа. Клянусь".

traits.locale_text: "Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."
"Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."
"Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."
"Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."

languages.text: “看来咱们两个都被打上了它的印记。我们的身体会被它致命的触碰所折磨，直到它被消灭为止。不过不要怕，狼领，我们会消灭它的。我发誓。”
languages.original_text: "Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: “看来咱们两个都被打上了它的印记。我们的身体会被它致命的触碰所折磨，直到它被消灭为止。不过不要怕，狼领，我们会消灭它的。我发誓。”

languages.text: 「となると、俺たちふたりとも烙印を押されてるな。奴を仕留めるまで、致命的な攻撃に悩まされることになる。だが、畏れることはない、アエット＝ヴァテル。俺たちが勝つ。俺は誓うぞ」
languages.original_text: "Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: 「となると、俺たちふたりとも烙印を押されてるな。奴を仕留めるまで、致命的な攻撃に悩まされることになる。だが、畏れることはない、アエット＝ヴァテル。俺たちが勝つ。俺は誓うぞ」

languages.text: «Entonces los dos estamos marcados. Nuestros cuerpos serán atormentados por su toque mortal hasta que lo derrotemos. Pero no tema, Aett-Vater, porque les venceremos. Lo juro».
languages.original_text: "Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: «Entonces los dos estamos marcados. Nuestros cuerpos serán atormentados por su toque mortal hasta que lo derrotemos. Pero no tema, Aett-Vater, porque les venceremos. Lo juro».

languages.text: « Alors, nous sommes tous les deux marqués. Nos corps seront torturés par son toucher mortel jusqu'à ce qu'il soit vaincu. Mais n'ayez crainte, aett-vater, nous le vaincrons. Je vous le jure. »
languages.original_text: "Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, nous sommes tous les deux marqués. Nos corps seront torturés par son toucher mortel jusqu'à ce qu'il soit vaincu. Mais n'ayez crainte, aett-vater, nous le vaincrons. Je vous le jure. »

languages.text: "Dann sind wir beide gezeichnet. Unsere Körper werden von seiner tödlichen Berührung geplagt, bis er besiegt ist. Aber keine Angst, Aett-Vater, wir werden ihn besiegen. Ich schwöre es."
languages.original_text: "Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: "Dann sind wir beide gezeichnet. Unsere Körper werden von seiner tödlichen Berührung geplagt, bis er besiegt ist. Aber keine Angst, Aett-Vater, wir werden ihn besiegen. Ich schwöre es."

languages.text: "O zaman ikimiz de mimlendik. Bedenlerimiz yenilene dek onun ölümcül dokunuşuyla eziyet çekecek. Ancak korkmana lüzum yok Aett-Vater. Onu yeneceğiz. Söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: "Then we are both marked. Our bodies will be tormented by its deadly touch until it is defeated. But fear not, Aett-Vater, we will defeat it. I swear it."

traits.locale_text: "O zaman ikimiz de mimlendik. Bedenlerimiz yenilene dek onun ölümcül dokunuşuyla eziyet çekecek. Ancak korkmana lüzum yok Aett-Vater. Onu yeneceğiz. Söz veriyorum."
